data_table.description: Retinal Exam Light Box, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RLBA0
variable.description: St= Normal reading, Q1=qc [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA1
variable.description: Eye (l, r) [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA2
variable.description: Grader [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBACY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA5
variable.description: Field definition [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6A
variable.description: Artifacts: haze [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6B
variable.description: Artifacts: dust/dirt [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6C
variable.description: Artifacts: lashes [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6D
variable.description: Artifacts: arc [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6E
variable.description: Artifacts: uneven illum/macula [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6F
variable.description: Artifacts: uneven illum/edge [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6G
variable.description: Artifacts: uneven illum/disc zone [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6H
variable.description: Artifacts: total blink [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA6I
variable.description: Artifacts: others [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA7
variable.description: Gradability [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA8
variable.description: Disc obscured or missing [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Yes - disc is either obscured or missing

variable.name: RLBA9
variable.description: Macula obscured or missing [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Yes - macular area is either obscured or missing

variable.name: RLBA10
variable.description: Arterial: focal narrowing within disc margin [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite focal narrowing in one or two substantial arterioles (definite)
Definite focal narrowing in three or more substantial arterioles (severe)

variable.name: RLBA11
variable.description: Arterial: focal narrowing in zone A [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite focal narrowing in one or two substantial arterioles (definite)
Definite focal narrowing in three or more substantial arterioles (severe)

variable.name: RLBA12A
variable.description: Arterial: focal narrowing, quadrant superior temporal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite focal narrowing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite focal narrowing, combined length >1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)
Definite focal narrowing, combined length = 2 DD (severe)

variable.name: RLBA12B
variable.description: Arterial: focal narrowing, quadrant superior nasal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite focal narrowing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite focal narrowing, combined length >1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)

variable.name: RLBA12C
variable.description: Arterial: focal narrowing, quadrant inferior nasal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite focal narrowing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite focal narrowing, combined length >1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)

variable.name: RLBA12D
variable.description: Arterial: focal narrowing, quadrant inferior temporal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite focal narrowing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite focal narrowing, combined length >1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)

variable.name: RLBA13A
variable.description: Arterial: sheathing, quadrant superior temporal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)

variable.name: RLBA13B
variable.description: Arterial: sheathing, quadrant superior nasal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 2 DD (severe)

variable.name: RLBA13C
variable.description: Arterial: sheathing, quadrant inferior nasal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 2 DD (severe)

variable.name: RLBA13D
variable.description: Arterial: sheathing, quadrant inferior temporal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length <1/2 DD (mild)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 1/2 DD, but < 2 DD (moderate)
Definite arteriolar sheathing, combined length = 2 DD (severe)

variable.name: RLBA14
variable.description: Generalized narrowing [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA15A
variable.description: A/V nicking, quadrant superior temporal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite A/V nicking, < ETDRS Std Photo #9 (definite)
Definite A/V nicking, = ETDRS Std Photo #9 (severe)

variable.name: RLBA15B
variable.description: A/V nicking, quadrant superior nasal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite A/V nicking, < ETDRS Std Photo #9 (definite)

variable.name: RLBA15C
variable.description: A/V nicking, quadrant inferior nasal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite A/V nicking, < ETDRS Std Photo #9 (definite)

variable.name: RLBA15D
variable.description: A/V nicking, quadrant inferior temporal [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite A/V nicking, < ETDRS Std Photo #9 (definite)
Definite A/V nicking, = ETDRS Std Photo #9 (severe)

variable.name: RLBA16
variable.description: Number of microaneurysms [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA17
variable.description: Number of retinal hemorrhages [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA18
variable.description: Type of retinal hemorrhage [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Questionable retinal hemorrhage (retinal hemorrhage questionably present)

variable.name: RLBA19
variable.description: Hemorrhages/microaneurysms [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Questionable micro aneurysm and/or retinal hemorrhage
Definite microaneurysms and/or retinal hemorrhages, but the amount is < ETDRS Std Photo #1 or more or equal to ETDRS Std Photo #1 in only one to three quadrants
Definite, more or equal to ETDRS Std Photo #1 in all four quadrants
Definite, more or equal to ETDRS Std Photo #2A in an area approximating an ETDRS field
Definite, more or equal to ETDRS Std Photo #2A in all four quadrants

variable.name: RLBA20
variable.description: Hard exudate [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA21
variable.description: Macula edema [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Macular edema present but less than clinically significant, inferred from hard exudates and/or other appearances
Clinically significant macular edema present, but center is not definitely involved, inferred from hard exudates and/or other appearances
Clinically significant macular edema with center definitely involved, inferred from hard exudates and/or other appearances

variable.name: RLBA22
variable.description: Soft exudate [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA23
variable.description: Intraretinal microvascular abnormalities (IRMA) [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite IRMA, < ETDRS Std Photo #8A, in one to three quadrants

variable.name: RLBA24
variable.description: Venous beading [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite venous beading in one quadrant only

variable.name: RLBA25
variable.description: New vessels on the disc (NVD) [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA26
variable.description: New vessels elsewhere (NVE) [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA27
variable.description: Vitreous and/or preretinal hemorrhage (VH/PRH) [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite vitreous and/or preretinal hemorrhage, totaling < 1 DA
Definite vitreous and/or preretinal hemorrhage, totaling more than 1 DA

variable.name: RLBA28
variable.description: Fibrous proliferation (FP) [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA29
variable.description: Papillary swelling [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA30
variable.description: Laser photocoagulation [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Definite photocoagulation treatment, scatter and/or local only
Definite photocoagulation treatment, focal and scatter and/or local

variable.name: RLBA31
variable.description: Diabetic retinal level [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA31A
variable.description: Diabetic retinopathy level: support evidence: A [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA31B
variable.description: Diabetic retinopathy level: support evidence: B [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Questionable soft exudate, IRMA or hard exudate
NVE more or equal to 1/2 DA
Cannot grade for microaneurysms; no other background retinopathy is present

variable.name: RLBA31C
variable.description: Diabetic retinopathy level: support evidence: C [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Questionable soft exudate, IRMA or hard exudate

variable.name: RLBA31D
variable.description: Diabetic retinopathy level: support evidence: D [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
variable.value: Questionable soft exudate, IRMA or hard exudate

variable.name: RLBA31E
variable.description: Diabetic retinopathy level: support evidence: E [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA32
variable.description: Central artery occlusion [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA33
variable.description: Branch artery occlusion [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA34
variable.description: Central vein occlusion [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA35
variable.description: Branch vein occlusion [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA36
variable.description: Hollenhorst plaque [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA37
variable.description: Asteroid hyalosis [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA38
variable.description: Large cup/disc ratio [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA39
variable.description: Retinal hemorrhage on the disc or crossing the disc margin [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA40
variable.description: Peripalliary atrophy [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA41
variable.description: Other disc abnormality [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA42
variable.description: Glial/vitreous thickening [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA43
variable.description: Medullated nerve fibers [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA44
variable.description: Cellophane reflex [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA45
variable.description: Surface wrinkling retinopathy [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA46
variable.description: Soft drusen within 2 dd of macular center [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA47
variable.description: RPE depigmentation [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA48
variable.description: Hyperpigmentation [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA49
variable.description: SSR detachment [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA50
variable.description: Subretinal hemorrhage [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA51
variable.description: Subretinal dibrosis [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA52
variable.description: Geographic atrophy [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA53
variable.description: Chorioretinal scar [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA54
variable.description: Nevus [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA55
variable.description: Retinal detachment [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA56
variable.description: Other ocular lesions [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBA57A
variable.description: Retinal notification sent [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: RLBAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Retinal Exam Light Box, exam 3]
